name: unmechanized
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not mechanized (= involving using a machine to do something that used to be done by hand): Furniture production in these factories is still largely unmechanized. The unmechanised infantry troops stood little chance against the enemy's tank batallions.
More examplesFewer examplesThe quality of the products produced in the small, unmechanized workshops that proliferate in this district is incredible.At that time, agriculture in the country was almost completely unmechanised.There were still some largely unmechanized coal mining operations in existence then.
